accessories.heading: Small
accessories.description: Capable of fusing ½” to 6” pipe.

accessories.heading: Medium
accessories.description: Capable of fusing pipe from 8” to 20”.

accessories.heading: Socket Fusion
accessories.subHeading: McElroy Socket Tooling offers the perfect method for the installation of fittings on small diameter pipe.
accessories.description: Socket fusion uses a male and female heat fusion tool to join a coupling to the pipe. Socket fusion kits from McElroy are designed to specifically meet ASTM F1056, ISO 8085-1 and ISO 4437 standards

accessories.heading: Datalogger
accessories.description: The Datalogger® 6 captures the most important data from your fusion jobsite to ensure that a joint was fused with the correct pressure and times according to supported standards.

accessories.heading: Accessories
accessories.description: Productivity tooling from McElroy is designed to assist operators in the safe handling and improved efficiency in the joining of pipe. Pipe Support Stands, Polyhorse pipe racks and cutting and bending tools are just some of the support equipment available.
